reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson explains complex concepts clearly and is always willing to help during office hours. Her enthusiasm for physics is contagious!

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Brilliant instructor! Prof. Chang's lectures are engaging and his programming assignments are challenging but rewarding. Highly recommended!

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez knows her subject well, but her lectures can be a bit dry. The lab sessions are interesting though.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Prof. Wilson seems knowledgeable but often goes off-topic during lectures. Grading can be inconsistent and feedback is minimal.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Thompson is an outstanding professor! Her lectures are thought-provoking and she incorporates current research into the curriculum. A true inspiration!
